attributes.action: dispense with the practice of judges determining the length of time convicted prisoners should serve
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prison sentencing is something of a lottery. Judges should decide only whether a term of imprisonment is appropriate. The length of time spent in prison should be determined by others, our representatives, better equipped and more knowledgeable of the prisoner's likelihood to re-offend.
